statements: SELECT * FROM IOCs WHERE ioc_id = 1;
SELECT ioc_type, ioc_value FROM IOCs WHERE detected_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM IOCs ORDER BY detected_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT ioc_type FROM IOCs;
SELECT ioc_id, ioc_type, detected_date FROM IOCs WHERE detected_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM IOCs WHERE ioc_type='URL';
SELECT ioc_id, ioc_type FROM IOCs WHERE detected_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT ioc_id, ioc_type, ioc_value FROM IOCs WHERE ioc_type='IP' ORDER BY detected_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM IOCs WHERE ioc_type='Domain' AND detected_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT ioc_id, ioc_type, detected_date FROM IOCs WHERE ioc_value LIKE '%malware%';
SELECT * FROM IOCs
SELECT indicator, type FROM IOCs WHERE type = 'malware'
SELECT id, threat_name, severity FROM Threats ORDER BY severity DESC
SELECT id, threat_name FROM Threats WHERE severity = 'high' AND description IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM IOCs WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM IOCs WHERE type = 'malware' AND created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT indicator, details FROM IOCs WHERE type = 'phishing' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM Threats WHERE severity = 'high' AND ioc_id IN (SELECT id FROM IOCs WHERE type = 'ransomware');
SELECT t.threat_name, i.indicator, i.created_at FROM Threats t INNER JOIN IOCs i ON t.ioc_id = i.id WHERE t.severity = 'critical' ORDER BY i.created_at ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*), type FROM IOCs GROUP BY type HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM IOCs;
SELECT indicator_value, description, created_at FROM IOCs WHERE indicator_type = 'malware';
SELECT * FROM Threats WHERE severity > 7 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT threat_type, threat_description, status FROM Threats WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM Incidents WHERE incident_type = 'data breach' AND is_resolved = false ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM IOCs WHERE indicator_type = 'IP' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT indicator_value, description FROM IOCs WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT incident_type, incident_description FROM Incidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Threats WHERE severity >= 7 AND status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM Threats WHERE threat_type = 'Malware' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM indicators_of_compromise;
SELECT ioc_type, ioc_value FROM indicators_of_compromise WHERE severity = 2;
SELECT description, severity FROM indicators_of_compromise WHERE ioc_type = 'Malware';
SELECT * FROM threats WHERE threat_level = 'High' ORDER BY detection_date DESC;
SELECT system_name, affected_date FROM affected_systems WHERE threat_id = '1234-5678-90ab-cdef';
SELECT * FROM indicators_of_compromise ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT threat_name, threat_level FROM threats WHERE detection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_name, affected_date FROM affected_systems ORDER BY affected_date ASC;
SELECT investigator_name, start_date, end_date FROM investigations WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM indicators_of_compromise WHERE ioc_type = 'IP Address' AND severity > 5;
SELECT * FROM indicators_of_compromise;
SELECT id, hash, type FROM indicators_of_compromise WHERE type='malware';
SELECT id, description FROM indicators_of_compromise ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM threat_actors WHERE country='Russia';
SELECT id, hostname FROM compromised_systems WHERE operating_system='Windows 10' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM threat_actors WHERE country='USA';
SELECT id, group, description FROM threat_actors ORDER BY group DESC;
SELECT * FROM compromised_systems WHERE operating_system='Windows' AND hostname LIKE '%server%';
SELECT id, severity, description FROM incidents WHERE severity='High' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, action_type, action_description FROM actions WHERE executed_by='Admin'
